      • downloadDocument

        public void downloadDocument(java.lang.String resourceId,
                    java.lang.String filepath,
                    java.lang.String format)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.net.MalformedURLException,
                             com.google.gdata.util.ServiceException,
                             java.lang.Exception
        Downloads a document.
        Parameters:
        filepath - path and name of the object to be saved as.
        resourceId - the resource id of the object to be downloaded.
        format - format to download the file to. The following file types are supported: documents: "doc", "txt", "odt", "png", "pdf", "rtf", "html"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        com.google.gdata.util.ServiceException
        java.lang.Exception
